short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A customizable New Tab page with backgrounds and widgets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replace the default new tab page with a personalized dashboard designed to enhance your focus, organization, and motivation towards your goals.

Opening a new tab often leads to distractions multiplying.
Imagine if each new tab served as a tool to help you refocus and center your attention.
Upgrade your browser with a visually appealing tab interface aimed at promoting tranquility, fostering deep concentration, and maintaining energy levels for your work and studies.

Try Demo: https://neptab.subarnabhandari.com
